approach.title: Discovery & Planning
approach.body: After the design has been frozen and the functional proof of concept has been accepted, our two offices work together under the supervision and leadership of your assigned project manager in order to deliver a seamlessly integrated professional website with both beauty and functionality

approach.title: Integration & Building
approach.body: Our extraordinary design skill coupled with a disciplined engineering process model distinguishes us from other design agencies. Our ideal job is to understand, create and cohesively manage all the dimensions, elements and components, which communicate your company’s image and objectives

services.title: Understand your vision
services.body: Based on your feedback, we iterate, polish, and adjust fire until you are completely satisfied, and your vision is realized. There is no limit to the design iterations. In the meantime, our “Left Brained” office works on any underlying programming, database design, or other technical requirements of the web application. We work hard to engineer the back-end so that it works efficiently and effectively. Our “Right Brained” office goes to work on the creative conceptualization of what the user interface should look like, and we present these concepts to you for feedback
